thread.title: Video: Sandstorm engulfs Chinese festival prompting a full evacuation in China
thread.title_full: Video: Sandstorm engulfs Chinese festival prompting a full evacuation in China - Telegraph

author: Telegraph video , video source Newsflare
title: Video: Sandstorm engulfs Chinese festival prompting a full evacuation in China
text: Dramatic scenes have emerged from North China showing a massive sandstorm hitting a local festival. The video , filmed in Sonid Right Banner - Inner Mongolia on Tuesday shows a huge wall of sand which can be seen engulfing the area. According to local reports, residents were holding a traditional festival when the storm struck. More than 20,000 people at the venue had to be evacuated. There were no injuries during the 30 minute storm . Sandstorm engulfs area
